Title: Tangled: Before Ever After
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Jase Ricci, Shane Prigmore (developed by), Chris Sonnenburg (developed for television by), Shane Prigmore (developed for television by), Chris Sonnenburg (developed by), Jase Ricci (story editor)
Actors: Zachary Levi, Mandy Moore, Eden Espinosa, Clancy Brown
Plot: As Rapunzel prepares for her coronation as Princess of Corona, one unforgettable night will change her hair again!
